name: eggplant amigurumi
yarn_weight: any gauge - designed for any gauge
notes:
learn to crochet this mini eggplant amigurumi with this free and easy pattern! this cute easy design is perfect for beginners and can be completed within an hour.

use any yarn you like, create a small keychain sized eggplant with sport weight cotton yarn, or make a larger plush version using super bulky chenille yarn. the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable food amigurumi plushie keychain.

link to english written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/free-eggplant-crochet-pattern/

link to dutch written pattern:
https://www.mariskavos.nl/nl/gratis-aubergine-knuffel-haakpatroon

link to english video tutorial:
https://youtu.be/glaqg20sshw

link to dutch video tutorial:
https://youtu.be/zlt4ec3an3k
